Text: The Adjustment Bureau:  The film tells the story of a young man who discovers that what appear to be chance events in his life are controlled by a technologically advanced intelligence network.
Triplets:<The Adjustment Bureau
4:
Text: The Adjustment Bureau:  After an event not planned by these controllers occurs – a romantic encounter with a young dancer – he struggles against their manipulation despite their promise of a great future for him.
